LABEL: 0x39A
STRING: The girl spread her arms wide and stood in my way.

LABEL: 0x3C4
STRING: What... What was she talking about...?

LABEL: 0x46A
STRING: In the dim darkness, her face was the very picture of seriousness.

LABEL: 0x510
STRING: I wasn't shocked. Pure anger welled up inside me.

LABEL: 0x570
STRING: 「Get out of the way! You're going to die!」

LABEL: 0x7BD
STRING: That was the light that killed Reiri.

LABEL: 0x7DB
STRING: You saw the moment it happened, didn't you?

LABEL: 0x80B
STRING: She breathed her last before she could put up any resistance, enveloped in light.

LABEL: 0x96E
STRING: How can you act like this when you witnessed it yourself――

LABEL: 0x9C2
STRING: What the hell kind of nerve do you have?!

LABEL: 0xB1A
STRING: Tokiwa gave me a cold look.

LABEL: 0xB7A
STRING: This was no time to be arguing.

LABEL: 0xBB2
STRING: The light was now closing in behind her.

LABEL: 0xD76
STRING: That was one of the things Reiri had said to us in her final moments.

LABEL: 0xE74
STRING: ...I didn't know what her words meant.

LABEL: 0xEA6
STRING: But, if what she could see something we couldn't, then dismissing her out of hand would be――

LABEL: 0xFC6
STRING: ――This wasn't the time to be thinking.

LABEL: 0xFF6
STRING: The light was finally about to reach Tokiwa's feet.

LABEL: 0x104A
STRING: I wouldn't make it in time.

LABEL: 0x107E
STRING: No matter how fast I reached out to her, it would only be a meaningless gesture.

LABEL: 0x10CA
STRING: A gesture of someone trying to save her.

LABEL: 0x10F4
STRING: An excuse that I hadn't abandoned her.

LABEL: 0x1124
STRING: No matter how much I tried to act the hero, I couldn't save her.

LABEL: 0x11A2
STRING: I was at my wit's end.

LABEL: 0x1338
STRING: Footsteps came running down the hallway.

LABEL: 0x1374
STRING: I saw a doctor's coat flying in.

LABEL: 0x1433
STRING: Hiragino tackled Tokiwa, pushing her away.

LABEL: 0x146F
STRING: She was blown almost straight off her feet, but I caught her on my chest.

LABEL: 0x15C3
STRING: Hiragino collapsed right next to her.

LABEL: 0x1601
STRING: The light hesitated for a moment after losing its prey.

LABEL: 0x162B
STRING: However, it didn't miss the new target that had appeared.

LABEL: 0x16E2
STRING: I ran up to Hiragino before the light corrected its trajectory.

LABEL: 0x1770
STRING: I firmly grasped his outstretched arm and pulled him close.

LABEL: 0x1857
STRING: Maybe it was because I had pulled him with such force, or maybe because he had sprained his ankle while pushing Tokiwa away.

LABEL: 0x1927
STRING: Tokiwa obeyed me obediently, as if our previous argument had never happened.

LABEL: 0x195F
STRING: The hem of her kimono fluttered as she started running.

LABEL: 0x19A1
STRING: I guess she didn't have any problems with running away as long as we didn't harm anyone's life...

LABEL: 0x1BC1
STRING: I lent Hiragino my shoulder as we ran along the flooded floor.

LABEL: 0x1BFB
STRING: Tokiwa was jogging at a meager pace, which was probably her full speed.

LABEL: 0x1C39
STRING: Hiragino and I ran after her, our shoulders linked.

LABEL: 0x1D2F
STRING: The light was slowly but surely following behind us.

LABEL: 0x1D6D
STRING: It was like it was crawling on the floor... No, that wasn't it.

LABEL: 0x1DA3
STRING: The green-colored light was approaching us as if smoothly swimming through the water.

LABEL: 0x1DDD
STRING: My shoes kept soaking in the water from the floor, but I kept on running while ignoring my heavy feet.

LABEL: 0x1E35
STRING: My muscles would be sore tomorrow.

LABEL: 0x1E5D
STRING: ...If, by any chance, I'd survive until tomorrow, that is.

LABEL: 0x1E97
STRING: For the time being, the gap between us and the light had widened considerably.

LABEL: 0x1F03
STRING: As I was running down the corridor, I tripped over something and stopped.

LABEL: 0x1F41
STRING: Did I just stub my big toe on something...?

LABEL: 0x2056
STRING: No sooner had he said that than Hiragino released my arm and lifted one of the cardboard boxes.

LABEL: 0x2163
STRING: Both of us picked up the cardboard boxes and started running again.

LABEL: 0x21A5
STRING: I didn't remember where or how long we ran after that.

LABEL: 0x21E1
STRING: All we could do was run like crazy, trying not to be caught by the light.

LABEL: 0x2221
STRING: And before we knew it, we had returned to the crew room we had left from.

LABEL: 0x2484
STRING: I manually opened the door, which was still unlocked.

LABEL: 0x24BC
STRING: Inside, Yukari and Touri were sitting down, waiting for us.

LABEL: 0x2648
STRING: 「It's been almost an hour since you left for the food.」

LABEL: 0x2685
STRING: 「You took so long that I started to get worried, but I'm glad everyone's fine――」

LABEL: 0x2790
STRING: Yukari was at a loss for words when she saw us.

LABEL: 0x27CC
STRING: I was out of breath, shoulders heaving. The cardboard boxes I was holding were completely wet.

LABEL: 0x2818
STRING: And as for Hiragino, he was drenched since he had collapsed on the floor while saving Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x2905
STRING: Yukari raised her voice in surprise and anger.

LABEL: 0x2BD7
STRING: I guess he was telling me not to spill the beans.

LABEL: 0x2C45
STRING: Indeed, if Yukari found out that we'd been in danger when we encountered the light, it could lead to another troublesome argument.

LABEL: 0x2CB5
STRING: Even if that wasn't the case, I was hesitant to make her worry even more.

LABEL: 0x2CF5
STRING: I didn't know if they had known each other for a long time or if they just got along well... but there was no one better than Hiragino when it came to handling Yukari.

LABEL: 0x2E33
STRING: 「Yeah... The floor on the first floor is covered in water.」

LABEL: 0x2F40
STRING: 「So, did you get that injury when you tripped as well?」

LABEL: 0x2F9E
STRING: When Yukari pointed it out, he looked over his entire body, and the area around the elbow of his doctor's coat was oozing red.

LABEL: 0x2FF4
STRING: He must have scraped himself when he tackled Tokiwa. It was quite painful to look at.

LABEL: 0x3183
STRING: 「You got that hurt just from falling over?!」

LABEL: 0x31C4
STRING: Rather than angry, Yukari simply yelled.

LABEL: 0x31EC
STRING: Touri stiffened in fear beside me.

LABEL: 0x335E
STRING: Hiragino tried to stop her from continuing, but it was too late.

LABEL: 0x3479
STRING: 「That light almost caught me, but I was saved.」

LABEL: 0x34D3
STRING: 「Therefore, Sousuke-san's injury is an honorable one.」

LABEL: 0x3602
STRING: When she looked up again, there was a hint of pain on her face.

LABEL: 0x364A
STRING: She stared at Hiragino as she tilted her head.

LABEL: 0x37DF
STRING: 「How many times do I have to tell you before you understand...?」

LABEL: 0x3935
STRING: 「If you're willing to go that far, take better care of yourself instead.」

LABEL: 0x397E
STRING: Saving someone by risking your life was proof of your bravery.

LABEL: 0x39B6
STRING: The degree of heroism he displayed was probably enough to be woven into a beautiful story.

LABEL: 0x3ACC
STRING: how should the person you saved live the rest of their life?」

LABEL: 0x3B1C
STRING: 「It might be foolish to live your life bound and trapped by your feelings for the dead...」

LABEL: 0x3B8E
STRING: 「It's not something you can just forget because you're told to.」

LABEL: 0x3CAE
STRING: Hiragino had a distant look on his face.

LABEL: 0x3D90
STRING: 「What would you say to those left behind as you rush to your death out of selfish sentimentality?!」

LABEL: 0x3DE7
STRING: 「It's not like Hiragino-san had a death wish back there.」

LABEL: 0x3E31
STRING: 「In fact, all of us managed to come back alive because of him...」

LABEL: 0x3ECD
STRING: 「You're just as guilty as him, Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x3F55
STRING: 「You put Tokiwa-san in danger while she was with you...」

LABEL: 0x4036
STRING: 「If I had known this would happen, I'd have gone myself.」

LABEL: 0x4087
STRING: There was nothing I could say in response.

LABEL: 0x40A7
STRING: It was bad luck that we had run into the light, but if I'd just escaped straight away without getting any weird ideas, that situation might have never happened.

LABEL: 0x4121
STRING: I knew there was no use thinking about the "what ifs," but if I had just made a better choice back then...

LABEL: 0x4215
STRING: A voice cut through the tense air.

LABEL: 0x4235
STRING: The master of the voice was Touri, who had been silent up until that point.

LABEL: 0x4265
STRING: Her pleading tone attracted everyone's attention.

LABEL: 0x4450
STRING: 「Why do we have to argue when everyone's finally back safe?」

LABEL: 0x4503
STRING: 「They even brought food back, so why...?」

LABEL: 0x45A8
STRING: 「They ran into some danger, but they're safe now, right?」

LABEL: 0x45E4
STRING: 「Then, we should be glad for our good luck that they survived in one piece!」

LABEL: 0x462C
STRING: 「Why can't you think of it that way?」

LABEL: 0x4660
STRING: 「Why does someone have to be in the wrong?」

LABEL: 0x46C1
STRING: She exposed her deepest thoughts and feelings all at once.

LABEL: 0x46F5
STRING: It might have been a shallow opinion that ignored the context, unable to grasp the reality of our situation.

LABEL: 0x4751
STRING: It might be just an argument of principle and impression due to ignorance.

LABEL: 0x47DF
STRING: Her honest outburst of feelings touched our hearts.

LABEL: 0x4940
STRING: Yukari and Hiragino exchanged awkward glances.

LABEL: 0x4974
STRING: The two might have known each other long before boarding the <SHEEP III>,

LABEL: 0x49C9
STRING: but for Touri, who didn't know about their history, their argument was nothing but stressful.

LABEL: 0x4AB4
STRING: Perhaps because she was in a position where she had to think about the passengers first,

LABEL: 0x4B04
STRING: Yukari seemed to feel responsible and fell silent.

LABEL: 0x4C4D
STRING: On the other hand, Hiragino looked around impatiently.

LABEL: 0x4C91
STRING: When his eyes met mine, he called out to me, trying to forcefully brighten the mood.

LABEL: 0x4D65
STRING: 「We have the food we brought with us. Let's hurry up and eat.」

LABEL: 0x4DAE
STRING: 「Yeah. After everything that's happened, it'd be a waste not to eat it.」

LABEL: 0x4F55
STRING: 「You have no objections, right, Tokiwa-kun? You want to eat delicious food, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x4FB0
STRING: 「Yes, I'll eat. Food is for that purpose.」

LABEL: 0x506C
STRING: 「...Wait, what did we bring with us again?」

LABEL: 0x50D7
STRING: The way he changed the subject was so awkward...

LABEL: 0x513F
STRING: But there was no use in pointing that out.

LABEL: 0x5173
STRING: I guess I should help him out, huh?

LABEL: 0x51D5
STRING: 「Man, there's a lot of stuff. Way more than I thought there would be.」

LABEL: 0x5207
STRING: 「Come and take a look too, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x52B8
STRING: We opened the boxes one by one.

LABEL: 0x52E0
STRING: Each of them was filled to the brim with food, and even though they were ready-made, there were a decent amount and variety.

LABEL: 0x533C
STRING: Compared to the normal image I had of emergency rations, these looked quite respectable.

LABEL: 0x5503
STRING: Looking at the wrapping she pulled out, I saw that it was a chicken sandwich I was used to seeing on land.

LABEL: 0x5571
STRING: ...So, you do know what they are, Touri.

LABEL: 0x55AB
STRING: No matter how you looked at it, that thing this morning wasn't a chicken sandwich...

LABEL: 0x5601
STRING: I had seriously considered whether the concept of chicken sandwiches in her brain was wrong.

LABEL: 0x56EC
STRING: Touri nodded to herself while going, "Yeah."

LABEL: 0x570E
STRING: Speaking of the sea, which culture was the chicken sandwich from...?

LABEL: 0x5966
STRING: As if on cue, we started preparing the food.

LABEL: 0x59A8
STRING: That said, it was just a matter of arranging the ready-made food and dishes...

LABEL: 0x5AC1
STRING: 「Come on, Momoi, which one do you want to eat?」

LABEL: 0x5B8A
STRING: 「Come on, how long are you going to sulk?」

LABEL: 0x5C65
STRING: Yukari turned away as she replied.

LABEL: 0x5D34
STRING: Hiragino sighed quietly, making sure she didn't hear him.

LABEL: 0x5E59
STRING: 「They're all edible if you open them, so you really just have to pick and choose.」

LABEL: 0x5F4A
STRING: 「Nope. We don't really have the means to do so, and cooking in the dark can lead to accidents...」

LABEL: 0x5F98
STRING: 「Even if that wasn't the case, we have people here whose cooking looks like an accident.」

LABEL: 0x5FD6
STRING: 「So no matter what you pick, you won't die. Come one, quickly now.」

LABEL: 0x608A
STRING: 「...That's kind of a strange way to put it.」

LABEL: 0x6153
STRING: 「Do you have a problem with my cooking skills?」

LABEL: 0x619E
STRING: 「I'm simply concerned about my sense of taste and stomach.」

LABEL: 0x6273
STRING: 「Hm? Why are you glaring at me like that?」

LABEL: 0x62A3
STRING: 「Do you want a chicken sandwich too, Momoi?」

LABEL: 0x6467
STRING: Yukari turned away and sat down in her seat with a chicken sandwich in hand.

LABEL: 0x64BF
STRING: That probably didn't go according to his scenario, but it seemed that Hiragino had succeeded in cheering her up.

LABEL: 0x65C1
STRING: 「Huh? Katagiri-san, did your stomach growl just now?」

LABEL: 0x661A
STRING: I didn't know if my stomach had really growled or not.

LABEL: 0x6650
STRING: But, when I saw the food in front of me, I felt hungry.

LABEL: 0x668E
STRING: I hadn't had much of an appetite until just a moment ago, but I guess I couldn't beat my instincts.

LABEL: 0x670F
STRING: 「Looks like everyone's ready. Shall we eat, then?」

LABEL: 0x6752
STRING: The food was laid out in front of us.

LABEL: 0x6770
STRING: I didn't know how long it had been... but I could feel time flowing slowly.

LABEL: 0x67AE
STRING: We sat around the small table with the same people as the first day of the accident.

LABEL: 0x67F6
STRING: Just as each of us were about to put our hands on our meals―that's when it happened.

LABEL: 0x6927
STRING: Time and space were cut off.

LABEL: 0x694D
STRING: Suddenly, it felt like I was being thrown around in the air.

LABEL: 0x697F
STRING: A lack of a sense of progress.

LABEL: 0x69BD
STRING: But, that was just a momentary illusion.

LABEL: 0x69E9
STRING: Gravity would never let us go.

LABEL: 0x6A99
STRING: 「Reiri probably hasn't eaten anything since this morning...」

LABEL: 0x6BC5
STRING: What was I supposed to say?

LABEL: 0x6C03
STRING: 「...If you're looking for Reiri, she's holed up in the lab.」

LABEL: 0x6C37
STRING: 「When we met earlier, she said she wasn't hungry... R-Right?」

LABEL: 0x6D4B
STRING: 「Yeah. When we told her we were all going to eat, she said not to worry about her...」

LABEL: 0x6D9A
STRING: What was I supposed to tell her?

LABEL: 0x6DCA
STRING: And so, I piled on lies.

LABEL: 0x6EAE
STRING: 「She won't eat anything if you leave her alone.」

LABEL: 0x6F59
STRING: 「She's so skinny that I have to make sure she's eating something.」

LABEL: 0x707E
STRING: 「Did she have anything to say for me?」

LABEL: 0x7131
STRING: 「Reiri was about to tell me something earlier.」

LABEL: 0x716D
STRING: 「I fell asleep right after that, so I don't know what it was in the end.」

LABEL: 0x722C
STRING: Words that couldn't reach her anymore.

LABEL: 0x73D8
STRING: 「I'll just have to ask her myself later!」

LABEL: 0x74DF
STRING: It echoed softly while lingering in the air.

LABEL: 0x75C9
STRING: Her honest words rolled from her lips.

LABEL: 0x75ED
STRING: They weren't influenced by anyone's pleads.

LABEL: 0x7615
STRING: They just exposed and cut to the heart of the matter.

LABEL: 0x76ED
STRING: 「I'm asking what you're all talking about.」

LABEL: 0x7768
STRING: Don't look at me like that.

LABEL: 0x7A09
STRING: I felt a familiar sense of despair.

LABEL: 0x7A29
STRING: There was no time to stop it anymore.

LABEL: 0x7A61
STRING: Even if I started running now, there was no stopping her.

LABEL: 0x7C14
STRING: Like an accumulated tab that was finally settled.

LABEL: 0x7C42
STRING: The moment of destruction came swiftly.

LABEL: 0x7DDD
STRING: There was no expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x7E03
STRING: With a frozen countenance, she forced the words together.

LABEL: 0x7FA0
STRING: Her voice clutching at straws was the embodiment of pain.

LABEL: 0x8040
STRING: But, there was no way anyone could say that.

LABEL: 0x808E
STRING: A strained smile appeared on Touri's lips.

LABEL: 0x80BE
STRING: A sharp voice tore through the air.

LABEL: 0x819E
STRING: 「Reiri-chan was attacked by that luminescent organism and died.」

LABEL: 0x827D
STRING: 「Hmm... I thought you already knew. Oh well, that's how it is.」

LABEL: 0x83B0
STRING: Indifferently, without the slightest hint of sentimentality.

LABEL: 0x845A
STRING: As she spoke, Tokiwa struggled against the wrapping paper of her chicken sandwich.

LABEL: 0x849C
STRING: The sound of her crumpling the wrapping echoed inside the room.

LABEL: 0x84FC
STRING: Not even reproach Tokiwa for what she had said.

LABEL: 0x8534
STRING: No one had the right to do that.

LABEL: 0x855A
STRING: Nor the right to comfort Touri.

LABEL: 0x8584
STRING: I couldn't look up from the food on the table.

LABEL: 0x880C
STRING: She removed her hand from the wrapper which she couldn't open, and...

LABEL: 0x88FD
STRING: There was no longer any way of stopping it.

LABEL: 0x8925
STRING: I could fool her no longer.

LABEL: 0x894B
STRING: After all, that was the undeniable truth.

LABEL: 0x89E0
STRING: It was overwhelming, brutal, and forceful.

LABEL: 0x8A0C
STRING: The truth didn't give any of us room for excuses.

LABEL: 0x8A7C
STRING: She talked about the rescue ship,

LABEL: 0x8C89
STRING: Having finished speaking, she calmly reached for the wrapping paper in front of her.

LABEL: 0x8CCB
STRING: She started struggling again with the chicken sandwich in her hand.

LABEL: 0x8D78
STRING: Touri was frozen in place, stunned.

LABEL: 0x8DAA
STRING: There was nothing reflected in her eyes.

LABEL: 0x8DD4
STRING: She was just staring into empty air.

LABEL: 0x8E67
STRING: The whole room was blanketed in silence.

LABEL: 0x8E9B
STRING: In the back of my mind, I saw the scene of Touri holding onto Reiri under the sprinklers.

LABEL: 0x8EEB
STRING: I recalled her emotionally unstable behavior when Reiri had gone missing.

LABEL: 0x8F2D
STRING: I had assumed that when she learned of Reiri's death, she would become just as unstable and restless as she had been back then.

LABEL: 0x8FBB
STRING: They were something you released without suppressing your emotions.

LABEL: 0x8FF9
STRING: She would be willing to hurt anyone, but would only cry for Reiri.

LABEL: 0x90F4
STRING: However, Touri didn't even give us a chance to apologize.

LABEL: 0x9168
STRING: Finally, Touri opened her mouth slightly and whispered.

LABEL: 0x9427
STRING: I had no answer to her question.

LABEL: 0x9477
STRING: ...I didn't know there was a choice.

LABEL: 0x94BB
STRING: I had just pulled Tokiwa's hand without thinking.

LABEL: 0x94EF
STRING: There was no better reason than that.

LABEL: 0x9517
STRING: I had no intention of leaving Reiri to die.

LABEL: 0x954F
STRING: I didn't know what my choice would cause...

LABEL: 0x957B
STRING: I didn't know what significance there was... I just――

LABEL: 0x96A0
STRING: 「It's not that he didn't try to save her――」

LABEL: 0x990A
STRING: Having successfully unwrapped her sandwich, she looked up.

LABEL: 0x9A78
STRING: Why would she ask a cruel question like that?

LABEL: 0x9AA8
STRING: I couldn't believe she would make Tokiwa talk about the manner of Reiri's, her friend's, death.

LABEL: 0x9AE2
STRING: And, I couldn't believe she would ask Tokiwa to tell her how her own sister died.

LABEL: 0x9B0C
STRING: Her unethical cruelty penetrated both Tokiwa and Touri herself.

LABEL: 0x9BEA
STRING: 「I ran away with Katagiri-san, who was pulling me by the hand.」

LABEL: 0x9C26
STRING: 「When I turned around in the hallway, the last time I saw Reiri-chan, she was enveloped in light from her feet to her chest.」

LABEL: 0x9D82
STRING: Still, I had no doubt that she felt something as well.

LABEL: 0x9DBA
STRING: I remembered what had happened in the lab earlier.

LABEL: 0x9DF2
STRING: In her own way, she had accepted the death of her friend.

LABEL: 0x9E2C
STRING: I wondered if Touri understood that.

LABEL: 0x9EAB
STRING: 「She was enveloped in that light and collapsed...」

LABEL: 0xA0BC
STRING: Touri shouted as she left the table and rushed out of the room.

LABEL: 0xA1B7
STRING: Yukari's words of restraint didn't reach the girl.

LABEL: 0xA273
STRING: She disappeared into the hallway without even turning around.

LABEL: 0xA2A1
STRING: The sound of her footsteps hitting the wet floor were loud.

LABEL: 0xA2CD
STRING: In the blink of an eye, she disappeared into the ship.

LABEL: 0xA5F4
STRING: And so, we ran after Touri and dashed out of the room.

LABEL: 0xA72B
STRING: We couldn't see Touri at all.

LABEL: 0xA753
STRING: She had flown out of the room without even a flashlight.

LABEL: 0xA785
STRING: Which meant she must be running around the ship in the dark...

LABEL: 0xA7DD
STRING: I followed her footsteps down the stairs.

LABEL: 0xA8DB
STRING: The distant sound of footsteps stopped for a moment.

LABEL: 0xA911
STRING: Did she trip over something and fall over?

LABEL: 0xA9AF
STRING: I couldn't see her in the darkness, but she was somewhere ahead of us.

LABEL: 0xAA0D
STRING: There was a loud wet sound from time to time mixed in with her regular steps.

LABEL: 0xAA45
STRING: Even as she fell down over and over again, Touri didn't stop walking.

LABEL: 0xAAB3
STRING: As we closed the gap between us, we eventually caught up to her.

LABEL: 0xABE8
STRING: Opening one of the rooms, she went inside and looked over the area.

LABEL: 0xAC2A
STRING: And then, moved on to the next room.

LABEL: 0xAC50
STRING: She carried out her routine like a ghost.

LABEL: 0xAF57
STRING: With that, she began searching through the rooms again.

LABEL: 0xAF8B
STRING: All we could do was follow her from behind.

LABEL: 0xB036
STRING: Until she was satisfied, until she gave up, we had no right to stop her.

LABEL: 0xB16E
STRING: We were nearing the bridge on the first floor at last.

LABEL: 0xB198
STRING: Touri stopped as she saw the open door.

LABEL: 0xB1E2
STRING: This was the place where Reiri had died.

LABEL: 0xB202
STRING: The place where we first encountered the light.

LABEL: 0xB3B7
STRING: It was finally time for her to accept the truth―

LABEL: 0xB4E8
STRING: 「She'll be forced to face the truth.」

LABEL: 0xB57F
STRING: 「Maybe it's better to stop her by force...」

LABEL: 0xB5F3
STRING: 「...All this time, you've avoided talking about the things you were guilty of only in front of her.」

LABEL: 0xB651
STRING: 「I just wondered if you had any special feelings for her.」

LABEL: 0xB6F8
STRING: I'd been kept in the dark about her death to the point where I wasn't even allowed to see her corpse.

LABEL: 0xB744
STRING: I wanted to see my sister, even if she was dead.

LABEL: 0xB784
STRING: Even if I couldn't save her, I wanted to know how she had died.

LABEL: 0xB7E2
STRING: 「I believe she has the right to know.」

LABEL: 0xB8A1
STRING: 「It's up to her to decide what to do afterward.」

LABEL: 0xB8DB
STRING: 「We mustn't take that opportunity away from her.」

LABEL: 0xB97D
STRING: Touri walked in front of us.

LABEL: 0xB999
STRING: We follow behind her small back.

LABEL: 0xBA0D
STRING: She was lying on the floor.

LABEL: 0xBAA5
STRING: Her small, thin, and powerless sprawled limbs.

LABEL: 0xBAF9
STRING: The thoughts welling up inside me were drowned out by a dim light.

LABEL: 0xBB37
STRING: Parts of her body were still glowing faintly, but that wasn't Reiri's light.

LABEL: 0xBD35
STRING: And so, she ran over and picked up her sister, who was lying on the floor.

LABEL: 0xBD7B
STRING: The light was drawing a strange pattern on the surface of her body.

LABEL: 0xBDB3
STRING: As Touri held her in her arms in order to sit her up――

LABEL: 0xBED6
STRING: Why was there a human body falling apart?

LABEL: 0xBF32
STRING: There was no way something like that could happen.

LABEL: 0xBF62
STRING: As Touri had said, this was no way for a human being to die――

LABEL: 0xBFFE
STRING: It floated up dimly in the darkness...

LABEL: 0xC05C
STRING: The light, or more accurately, the glowing black organism,

LABEL: 0xC151
STRING: I immediately pulled Touri from behind.

LABEL: 0xC19F
STRING: The shock of being touched on the arm by the light and the sudden tug on her back knocked Reiri out of her hands.

LABEL: 0xC1FB
STRING: She collapsed on the floor again.

LABEL: 0xC225
STRING: Her faintly glowing body was filled with an inexplicable eeriness.

LABEL: 0xC38D
STRING: I turned around at the sound of Yukari's voice.

LABEL: 0xC3AD
STRING: Her and Tokiwa's backs were there in front of me.

LABEL: 0xC3DD
STRING: The two of them were standing right next to each other, staring at something beyond the bridge.

LABEL: 0xC425
STRING: Their eyes were fixed on the depths of the front section...

LABEL: 0xC52C
STRING: An unbelievable scene unfolded before me.

LABEL: 0xC61E
STRING: A literal tidal wave of light was surging toward us from the front section.

LABEL: 0xC66E
STRING: I grabbed Touri's arm as she was thrashing around.

LABEL: 0xC698
STRING: 「We need to get out of here, Touri!」

LABEL: 0xC78B
STRING: I ignored Touri's yells and hoisted her up on my shoulder.

LABEL: 0xC805
STRING: 「Shut up! You'll bite your tongue like that!」

LABEL: 0xC91D
STRING: I ran as fast as I could to the rear section.

LABEL: 0xC955
STRING: In the blink of an eye, I was separated from Yukari and Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0xC98D
STRING: Where to escape to...? That's right.

LABEL: 0xC9B5
STRING: I rushed into the warehouse where I had discovered Reiri and closed the door from the inside.

LABEL: 0xCAAD
STRING: Even though the <SHEEP III> had remained in the dark since the blackout, it was hard to find a place without a single source of light like this.

LABEL: 0xCB32
STRING: 「I guess that's a relief for now...」

LABEL: 0xCB5C
STRING: I lowered Touri from my shoulder to the floor.

LABEL: 0xCD7F
STRING: I was lying face-up on the floor.

LABEL: 0xCDA7
STRING: For a moment, I didn't understand what had happened.

LABEL: 0xCDD3
STRING: I tried to get up, but she held my head down and I collapsed to the floor again.

LABEL: 0xCE7B
STRING: Touri's slender fingers dug into my neck.

LABEL: 0xD006
STRING: I tried to peel off her fingers, but they showed no sign of loosening their grip at all.

LABEL: 0xD0FF
STRING: Was she trying to avenge her sister?

LABEL: 0xD125
STRING: Touri screamed in a voice filled with hatred.

LABEL: 0xD1A1
STRING: If she was going to kill me, that might be for the best.

LABEL: 0xD2BA
STRING: I couldn't die in a place like this...!

LABEL: 0xD312
STRING: Was there... any way to save myself...?

LABEL: 0xD33A
STRING: Then, suddenly, my hand searching the floor caught something.

LABEL: 0xD3B6
STRING: I tried to hold it up but ended up dropping it.

LABEL: 0xD403
STRING: The sound of something rolling on the floor echoed in the dark warehouse.

LABEL: 0xD425
STRING: It was the light sound of a plastic container.

LABEL: 0xD4CA
STRING: The grip on my neck loosened.

LABEL: 0xD54F
STRING: Touri picked up the object I'd dropped.

LABEL: 0xD58B
STRING: She rolled it around in the palm of her hand in the darkness.

LABEL: 0xD5D5
STRING: I had no idea what was going on.
